patient_info: Proteinuria,Xerostomia,Hematuria,Hypertension,Premature birth,Thrombocytosis,Leukocytosis,Chronic diarrhea,Drowsiness,Arthralgia,Increased blood urea nitrogen,Elevated circulating creatinine concentration,Decreased body weight
golden_diagnosis: 法布雷病/Fabry disease/Fabry disease/Fabry disease,法布雷病/Fabry disease/Fabry disease/Fabry disease,法布雷病/Fabry disease/Fabry disease/Fabry disease
predict_diagnosis:
1. Dense deposit disease (Type II Thrombotic Microangiopathy)
2. Systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE) with renal involvement
3. Mixed connective tissue disease (MCTD) with overlapping features of SLE and scleroderma
4. Celiac disease with secondary lymphocytic gastritis and enteropathy
5. Inflammatory bowel disease (IBD) with ulcerative colitis or Crohn's disease
6. Autoimmune polyangiitis (formerly known as Wegener's granulomatosis)
7. Hemolytic uremic syndrome (HUS) in an atypical or persistent form
8. Primary Sjögren's syndrome with renal and extraglandular manifestations
9. Chronic active hepatitis or autoimmune hepatitis with systemic symptoms
10. End-stage renal disease (ESRD) with uremia and associated multi-organ dysfunction

Please note that these diagnoses are based on the symptoms provided and are meant to be comprehensive, but further clinical, laboratory, and sometimes genetic testing would be necessary to confirm any of these conditions.
